body_content.explanation: a bird or an animal that feeds on dead animals that it has not killed itself:
examples: Most dead birds are picked up by crows or other scavengers.
An urban fox is a harmless scavenger which, when it can't find other sources of food, will prey on small mammals.

body_content.explanation: someone who collects things that people have thrown away or left somewhere:
examples: She earns her living as a scavenger at the city dump.
Then scavengers came and dug up the metals worth selling.
